parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create a new item and try to link it into goggles slot. This command doesn't add NVGoggles. Use [[addItem]] and [[assignItem]] or just [[linkItem]] for latter.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addGoggles''' type

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addGoggles]] "G_Tactical_Clear";
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>diver [[addGoggles]] "G_Diving";
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[goggles]], [[removeGoggles]]
</value></part></template></root>
